video.title: You Live in What?
video.synopsis: Visionary builders show off one-of-a-kind homes created out of the most unlikely dilapidated structures, from a ferry boat to a pipe organ factory.

episodes.synopsis: Visit an abandoned Caribbean sugar mill, a Texas boot factory, a 19th-century schoolhouse and a bus that have been repurposed into luxury homes.
episodes.title: Sugar Mill, Clock Tower, Bus

episodes.synopsis: A grain silo, a fire station, a blacksmith shop, an undercroft and a historic tavern are among the structures converted into modern living spaces.
episodes.title: Farm, Church, Undercroft

episodes.synopsis: A barn, a jail, a onetime dance hall, a school, a library and a rescue boat are included in this episode's visit to home conversions around the world.
episodes.title: Barn, Jail, Water Tower

episodes.synopsis: This episode visits a grocery store, a former hospital, a castle and even a caboose that have been turned into up-to-date, comfortable living spaces.
episodes.title: Castle, Hospital, Caboose

episodes.synopsis: Witness the conversion of a grist mill, a gypsy wagon, a dog kennel, a church and a meat packing plant into lavish, upscale residences.
episodes.title: Castle, Gypsy Wagon, Kennel

episodes.synopsis: An airplane hangar, a former bank and a Soviet radio factory are transformed into comfortable new homes, and a barn becomes a straw bale house.
episodes.title: Bank, Airplane Hangar, Chapel

episodes.synopsis: Historic structures, including a water tower, a former naval coal plant, a fire station and even a jail, are transformed into new homes.
episodes.title: Water Tower, Jail, Distillery

episodes.synopsis: Travel the globe to visit a train depot, an ice cream factory, a tavern and even a former geisha house that have been transformed into unique homes.
episodes.title: Bus, Tavern, Geisha House

episodes.synopsis: The series visits a former corset factory, a World War II-era English control tower and an elevator converted into modern homes.
episodes.title: Corset Factory, Firehouse, Kura

episodes.synopsis: Historic structures around the world, including a bakery, a carriage house, a church and a dance hall, are transformed into modern homes.
episodes.title: Bakery, Church, Dance Hall

episodes.synopsis: This episode reveals how an old opera house, a bakery, a carriage house and even a notorious brothel have been converted into modern homes.
episodes.title: Temple, House Truck, Opera Hall

episodes.synopsis: The series visits a onetime saloon, an old corner store, a boiler house, a feed shop and a windmill that have been transformed into modern homes.
episodes.title: Saloon, Bakery, Windmill

episodes.synopsis: This episode visits an Airstream trailer, a former depot, a pump house and a cave, each transformed into a comfortable, modern living space.
episodes.title: Hayloft, Airstream, Cave
